thread.title: Kim Kardashian Shares Message From French Paparazzi After 'KUWTK' Robbery Episode
thread.title_full: Kim Kardashian Shares Message From French Paparazzi After 'KUWTK' Robbery Episode

title: Kim Kardashian Shares Message From French Paparazzi After 'KUWTK' Robbery Episode
text:
— Kim Kardashian West (@KimKardashian) March 20, 2017 
"I was looking at the gun, looking down back at the stairs. I have a split second in my mind to make this quick decision. Am I going to run down the stairs and either be shot in the back — it makes me so upset to think about it — but either they're going to shoot me in the back or if I make it and they don't, if the elevator doesn't open in time or the stairs are locked, then I'm f--ked! There's no way out," she recalled during KUWTK . "And then, [one robber] grabs my legs and I wasn't, you know, I had no clothes on under. He pulled me toward him at the front of the bed and I thought, 'OK, this is the moment they're going to rape me. I fully mentally prepped myself — and then he didn't." Kim Kardashian West during Paris Fashion Week on September 28, 2016 in Paris, France. Antoine Gyori - Corbis/Corbis via Getty Images 
Kardashian reunited with her husband, Kanye West , in NYC after the robbery, and Paris police charged 10 suspects in January. Last month, she tried to help identify robbers with a judge and attorney. 10 Times Kim Kardashian Got Mad on Social Media 
"I took a tragic horrific experience and did not let it diminish me, rather grew and evolved and allowed the experience to teach me," she tweeted on Sunday night. "I can say I've become so much better because of it....thank you for allowing me to share my story tonight #KUWTK."
